title: Chuquimamani-Condori Releases New Album Edits: Listen
description: A surprise project that compiles the experimental artist’s DJ edits from the past six years
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: A surprise project that compiles the experimental artist’s DJ edits from the past six years
text: Chuquimamani-Condori has released a new album that collects their DJ edits from the past six years. Find the 24-track Edits below.Edits is Chuquimamani-Condori’s first solo project since 2023’s DJ E. It’s also surprise follow-up to Los Thuthanaka, their standout collaborative album with their brother, Joshua Chuquimia Crampton, that Joshua Minsoo Kim called “a dizzying reorientation to the possibility of what music can or should sound like.”Check out Pitchfork’s list of “The 100 Best Albums of the 2020s So Far,” featuring Chuquimamani-Condori’s DJ E at No. 9. And see more about Los Thuthanaka in “The Best Music of 2025 So Far.”
html:
Chuquimamani-Condori has released a new album that collects their DJ edits from the past six years. Find the 24-track Edits below.

Edits is Chuquimamani-Condori’s first solo project since 2023’s DJ E. It’s also surprise follow-up to Los Thuthanaka, their standout collaborative album with their brother, Joshua Chuquimia Crampton, that Joshua Minsoo Kim called “a dizzying reorientation to the possibility of what music can or should sound like.”

Check out Pitchfork’s list of “The 100 Best Albums of the 2020s So Far,” featuring Chuquimamani-Condori’s DJ E at No. 9. And see more about Los Thuthanaka in “The Best Music of 2025 So Far.”
